channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Change wp-admin login
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Change wp-admin login

item.title: CVE-2022-1589|2024-08-03T00:10:03.626Z -- unknown -- change%20wp-admin%20login
item.description: The Change wp-admin login WordPress plugin before 1.1.0 does not properly check for authorisation and is also missing CSRF check when updating its settings, which could allow unauthenticated users to change the settings. The attacked could also be performed via a CSRF vector
